IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: LAWRENCE PROSPERA IS COMMITTED TO STRENGTHENING THE INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES OF LAWRENCE THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT OF THRIVING COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO STRENGTHEN INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES OF LAWRENCE, MA THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT OF THRIVING NEIGHBORHOODS BY PROVIDING OPPORTUNITY YOUTH LIFE SKILLS AND CAREER TRAINING, ADULT EDUCATION SERVICES, LEASED SPACE AND BUSINESS MANAGEMENT FOR A PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL AND TURNAROUND PROVIDER FOR UNDERPERFORMING SCHOOL DISTRICTS.
IRS990.Desc: ADULT PROGRAMMING ADDRESSES A WIDE RANGE OF ISSUES IMPORTANT TO FAMILIES IN THE CITY OF LAWRENCE WITH CLASSES AND SERVICES FOCUSED ON CITIZENSHIP EDUCATION, ENGLISH AS A SECOND LANGUAGE (ESL), MINORITY LEADERSHIP, SUSTAINING ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITIES AND FINANCIAL LITERACY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SISU YOUTH PROGRAMMING DEVELOPS THE EDUCATIONAL AND LEADERSHIP POTENTIAL OF INNER CITY YOUTH AND YOUNG ADULTS IN LAWRENCE TO IMPROVE THEIR LIVES AND COMMUNITY THROUGH SERVICE AND SUSTAINING ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITIES. YOUTH ADVOCACY TO FOSTER LIFELONG LEARNING AND CAREER DEVELOPMENT.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: THE CORPORATION IS A CONTRACTED MANAGEMENT ORGANIZATION FOR AN INDEPENDENT PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL AND A PREFERRED PROVIDER AS TURNAROUND OPERATOR FOR UNDERPERFORMING PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS FOR SECONDARY EDUCATION FOR THE RELATED LAWRENCE FAMILY DEVELOPMENT CHARTER SCHOOL GRADUATES.

THE ORGANIZATION, INCORPORATED UNDER CHAPTER 180 OF THE MASSACHUSETTS GENERAL LAWS AS A TAX-EXEMPT ENTITY, HAS BEEN GRANTED TAX-EXEMPT STATUS UNDER THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC) SECTION 501(C)(3) AND IS CLASSIFIED AS OTHER THAN A PRIVATE FOUNDATION AS DEFINED BY SECTION 509(A) OF THE IRC. THEREFORE, IT IS GENERALLY EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES. ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS PROVIDED FOR IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE CORPORATION IS REQUIRED BY ASC 740-10, "ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES," TO EVALUATE AND DISCLOSE TAX POSITIONS THAT COULD HAVE AN EFFECT ON THE CORPORATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE CORPORATION REPORTS ITS ACTIVITIES TO THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE AND THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS ON INFORMATIONAL RETURNS THAT ARE GENERALLY SUBJECT TO AUDIT AND REVIEW BY THE GOVERNMENTAL AGENCIES FOR A PERIOD OF THREE YEARS AFTER FILING. MANAGEMENT BELIEVES IT IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO REVIEW BY TAXING AUTHORITIES FOR PERIODS PRIOR TO 2020. SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF THE CORPORATION'S INCOME, EXPENDITURES AND ACTIVITIES RELATE TO ITS EXEMPT PURPOSE. THEREFORE, MANAGEMENT HAS DETERMINED THAT THE CORPORATION IS NOT SUBJECT TO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAXES AND WILL CONTINUE TO QUALIFY AS A TAX-EXEMPT NOT-FOR-PROFIT ENTITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CORPORATION PROVIDES MANAGEMENT SERVICES TO THE CHARTER SCHOOL AND ENSURES THAT FUNDS ARE USED FOR THE INTENDED PROGRAM. SCHOLARSHIP RECIPIENTS ARE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE GRADE REPORTS FROM THEIR HIGHSCHOOLS IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE AWARD.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: FIRST REAL ESTATE MORTGAGE AND ASSIGNMENT OF LEASE AND RENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MASSACHUSETTS DEVELOPMENT FINANCE AG FIRST REAL ESTATE MORTGAGE AND ASSIGNMENT OF LEASE AND RENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE M, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 32B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LAWRENCE PROSPERA USES FIDELITY INVESTMENTS TO PROCESS ANY CONTRIBTUIONS IN THE FORM OF STOCK DONATIONS.

TO STRENGTHEN INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES OF LAWRENCE, MA THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT OF THRIVING NEIGHBORHOODS BY PROVIDING OPPORTUNITY YOUTH LIFE SKILLS AND CAREER TRAINING, ADULT EDUCATION SERVICES, LEASED SPACE AND BUSINESS MANAGEMENT FOR A PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL AND TURNAROUND PROVIDER FOR UNDERPERFORMING SCHOOL DISTRICTS.
DRAFT COPIES OF THE FORM 990 ARE PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL PRIOR TO ITS FILING. THE DIRECTORS MAKE ANY NECESSARY CHANGES AND APPROVE THE FORM BEFORE SUBMISSION.

GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE AT THE CORPORATION'S OFFICES UPON REQUEST. THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE ALSO AVAILABLE THROUGH THE MA ATTORNEY GENERAL'S DIVISION OF PUBLIC CHARITIES' OFFICE. LHA
